name: WiX Localization File
summary: Learn about .WXL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can modify where the culture is set by editing the WixLocalization culture string. A sample of a WXL file and its culture string can be seen below:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <WixLocalization Culture="en-us" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com /wix/2006/localization"> <String Id="errormsg" Overridable="yes"> General Failure</Stringgt; </WixLocalization>

description: File created by the Windows Installer XML (WiX) toolset, a Windows installer development program; contains a collection of strings for localizing a product for a specific culture; includes translated user interface text for several languages.
